name: review_files
description: Submit a list of files for detailed code review within a Pull Request. This tool should be used to flag files that require careful examination due to critical changes, potential issues, or significant impact on the codebase.

filename.description: Full path and name of the file to review

changes.description: Concise summary of the changes made to this file in the PR

related_changes.description: Brief description of related changes in other files or relevant context that impacts the review of this file

reason.description: Specific rationale for why this file needs careful review, highlighting potential concerns or areas of focus
